channel.title: Point System
channel.description:
I just want to make a shop that has items like, Party hats and stuff.
But instead of being able to pay with them by cash, I would like to make a Point system, Like example.
You fight KBD, and earn say 20 points, out of like 3000 needed for a pat.
How do i set it up?
